# Introduction

Welcome to the developer documentation for SafePal Wallet. The purpose of this document is to explain how to build a DApp using the SafePal Wallent.

You can find the latest version of SafePal Wallet on our official website (opens new window)

  • IOS Download (opens new window)
  • Android Download (opens new window)
  • Chrome Extension (opens new window)
